purpose: Automate and optimize the process of web3 bug hunting by deploying autonomous agents.
principle: Utilizes autonomous agents to perform tasks related to bug tracking and bounty management in web3 environments.
reusability: Designed to be extensible with support for launching agents that can perform arbitrary tasks, providing a flexible framework for web3 bug hunting.
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, which may include limited features and potential stability issues.
name: legion
description: Scrappy assistant that automates web3 bug hunting workflows. Tracks ongoing bug bounties and launches autonomous agents that can perform arbitrary tasks.
highlight: Autonomous agents that automate web3 bug hunting workflows and track ongoing bug bounties.
